question: You have a full-time job and you are also doing a part-time evening course.You now find that you cannot continue the course.Write a letter to your teachers. In your letterdescribe the situationexplain why you cannot continue at this timesay what action you would like to take
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I cannot attend an evening course for a couple of weeks.

Currently, I remove to another accommodation, which is situated in the South part of our city. As you know this is too far away from courses and after work, I will have to go strictly to home. So that I cannot continue my participation.

This accommodation belongs to my granny. She lives there last 10 years, but, currently, she has gone to a vocation in the USA and wondering I to take care of her cat. I could not refuse her request. We are very close to each other. Hopefully, this situation is temporary and when she will came back, I can resume attending the course.

For this reason, I was wondering, if you could help me and freeze my membership card for 14 days? I do not want to lose my membership. Moreover, I have paid some money in advance, and I do not want to reject this payment.
I am looking forward to hearing from you,
